title: Skills & Certifications
text:
Strength Highlights

Customer-Centric Leadership: Delivered service excellence in retail operations by aligning strategies with client needs and improving customer satisfaction.
Evidence-Based Decision Making: Applied data-driven analysis to support transparent business recommendations and reduce risk.
Strategic Communication: Translated complex insights into clear, visual storytelling through dashboards, executive briefs, and stakeholder¬†reports.

title: Projects & Case Studies
text:
Role: Consultant


Focus: ADKAR vs Kotter, cost‚Äìbenefit (incl.¬†intangibles), CRM, paperless workflow


Artifacts: Executive video, Word plan, process maps


Outcome: Roadmap to e-filing, portal adoption, and analytics readiness







Methods: Forecasting, Linear Programming, Cost‚ÄìVolume‚ÄìProfit


Artifacts: Excel models, dashboards, Solver outputs


Outcome: Insights into pricing, capacity, and break-even decisions







Study: LLM-generated vs human-refined outline (Quarto report)


Data: Evaluator heatmaps, trend lines


Outcome: Human-in-the-loop improved clarity & accuracy







Issue: Food waste & eco-friendly packaging


Deliverables: APA 7th report with references


Outcome: Circular-economy insights + stakeholder KPIs
